channel.title: Checking there name
channel.description:
how i make it check if there name is like this...
asdfasdf or.. 12341234
how i make it check if 4st 4 letters are same as 2nd 4 letters and name is 8 characters long
any1 no? spammer with ip changer been spamming me for about a week now non-stop...
i want it to check if there name has 2 sets of the same letters if the letters are 4 in a row, any clues?
REP++ FOR HELPERS

item.title: Checking there name
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Tatemo:

IF it was my server i would just tell everyone to go to the forums and then turn it off for half an hour or so till they leave u alone luckily my server only allows one connection per ip and bans anyone who makes 100 connections in a row too quickly

Too bad they used a proxy and they don’t ‘leave you alone’ since they don’t care if the server is online or offline. It’s the laughing-man bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Checking there name
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

hmmm i think i got an idea

wats the proper form for this? (0 errors and will work)

if (command.contains(“L☻a☺u☻”)) {
appendToBanned(“playername”);
}

EDIT: qwerty, the command doesn’t work for him, but he sends it rapidly sometimes more then 1 of them on cuz no staff are on and its spamming the box so fast no1 can even send a connection
also while hes on i think hes sending some weird fake packets…

Read full topic

item.title: Checking there name
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:21, topic:281095”]i made yell mods only
a long time ago
idk how but i think he’s sending fake packets or something hmm[/quote]
If he’s still able to use the yell command then the only feasible explanation is that it isn’t a mod only command.
Is that how he’s disconnecting people? You should change your yell command so it doesn’t allow alt-codes.

Read full topic

thanks il try implenting it

item.title: Checking there name
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Reread first post:

boolean bad = playerName.length() > 8 ? true : playerName.substring(4).equals(playerName.substring(4, 8)) ? false : true;

if (!bad) {
banFagsAndShit();
}

Thanks to Taharok for explaining that to me

Read full topic
